## IMock.mocksFolder property

The root folder of all mocks, from which specific mocks paths will be resolved (resolved against [options.root](./kassette.mockingoptions.root.md)<!-- -->)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly mocksFolder: string;
```
